mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT O.ORDER_NUM, O.ID, ME.NAME, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE, O.ORDER_STATUS, S.SUB_CATE_NAME, S.SUB_CATE_NUM, M.MAIN_CATE_NAME, M.MAIN_CATE_NUM, O.EXIST_ADDR_FLAG FROM PRODUCT_ORDER O,ORDER_DETAIL D,PRODUCT P, CATEGORY_SUB S, CATEGORY_MAIN M, MEMBER ME WHERE O.ORDER_STATUS IN ('4','5') AND S.SUB_CATE_NUM = ( SELECT MIN(SS.SUB_CATE_NUM) FROM CATEGORY_SUB SS, PRODUCT_ORDER OO WHERE OO.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM) AND O.ORDER_NUM = D.ORDER_NUM AND D.PRD_NUM = P.PRD_NUM AND P.SUB_CATE_NUM = S.SUB_CATE_NUM AND S.MAIN_CATE_NUM = M.MAIN_CATE_NUM AND O.ID = ME.ID ORDER BY ORDER_NUM
